label: none
description: None, immunotherapy was not part of the planned first course of therapy; not customary therapy for this cancer. Diagnosed at autopsy.

label: administered
description: Immunotherapy administered as first course therapy.

label: not administered, patient risk factors
description: Immunotherapy was not recommended/administered because it was contraindicated due to patient risk factors (comorbid conditions, advanced age, etc.) or there was progression of disease prior to administration.

label: not administered, patient death
description: Immunotherapy was not administered because the patient died prior to planned or recommended therapy.

label: recommended, not administered, NOS
description: Immunotherapy was not administered. It was recommended by the patient's physician but was not administered as part of the first-course of therapy. No reason was noted in the patient record.

label: recommended, refused
description: Immunotherapy was not administered. It was recommended by the patient's physician but was refused by the patient or the patient's family or guardian. The refusal was noted in the patient record.

label: recommended, unknown if administered
description: Immunotherapy was recommended, but it is unknown if it was administered.
